Package com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data

Contains data related classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ChangeEventSource Interface for object that notify listeners when changed.
ChangeListener Interface for objects that listen for model change events.
DataCallback Callback used when sending remote data back to the client.
DataProxy<C extends LoadConfig> Defines the interface for objects that can retrieve data.
DataReader Interface for objects that can read raw data and produce a set of Model objects.
LoadConfig

Contains configuration data for data load operations.
Loader Interface for objects that can retrieve remote data.
LoadResult<Data> Defines the interface for object returned from a remote procudure call.
Model

Primary interface for GXT model objects with event support.
ModelData

Primary interface for GXT model objects without support events.
ModelStringProvider Interface for objects that can translate a model's typed values to strings.
TreeModel A Model that supports children.
 

Class Summary
BaseLoadConfig Default LoadConfig implementation.
BaseLoader<C extends BaseLoadConfig> Default implementation of the Loader interface.
BaseLoadResult<D> Contains the results of a data load operation.
BaseLoadResult.CollectionLoadResult<X>  
BaseLoadResult.FailedLoadResult  
BaseLoadResult.ModelCollectionLoadResult<X extends Model>  
BaseModel Models are generic data structures that notify listeners when changed.
BaseModelData Default ModelData implementation.
BaseModelStringProvider Basic implementation of the ModelStringProvider interface.
BaseTreeModel Default implementation of of the TreeModel interface.
ChangeEvent Instances of this class are sent as a result of model changes.
ChangeEventSupport Default implementation of the ChangeEventSource interface.
DataField Describes a field in a Model.
DataLoader<C extends BaseLoadConfig> A BaseLoader used to retrieve and convert raw data.
HttpProxy<C extends LoadConfig> A concrete DataProxy that retrieves data using RequestBulder instances.
JsonReader A DataReader implementation that reads JSON data using a ModelType definition and produces a set of Model instances.
LoadEvent<C extends LoadConfig,R extends LoadResult> Instances of this class are sent as a result of load operations.
ModelReader A DataReader implementation for Model instances.
ModelType Describes the fields and structure of a Model.
PropertyChangeEvent A ChangeEvent for property changes.
RpcMap RpcMap is used to workaround a part of GWT RPC system.
RpcMap_CustomFieldSerializer  
RpcProxy<C extends LoadConfig,R extends LoadResult> DataProxy implementation that retrieves data using GWT RPC.
XmlReader A DataReader implementation that reads XML data using a ModelType definition and creates Model instances.
 

Package com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data Description

Contains data related classes.
